rukus.text: Tamen wen ni [mu sheng]“linghun” shi shenme. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Linghun wei wo de zhu zhidao, nimen [renlei] zhi shou cile [guanyu linghun] hen shao de zhishi [zhu].”
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo biding shouhui wo suo qishi ni de [“gulanjing”], ranhou, ni jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe lai fankang wo.
Chufei yi ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui. Ta ci ni [mu sheng] de enhui que shi juda de.
Ni shuo:“Jiaru renlei he jingling dou lianhe qilai chuangzuo zheyang yi bu “gulanjing”, name, jishi tamen huxiang bangzhu, tamen ye buneng chuangzuo chu tongyang de jing wen.”
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei chanming ge zhong biyu, dan da duoshu ren haishi guzhi bu xin.
Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu xiangxin ni [mu sheng], chufei ni neng cong di li wei women yong chu yi gu quanshui lai;
huo ni youyige ye zao shu he putao [zhu] shu de guoyuan, ni neng shi zhu heliu xiang qijian;
huo xiang ni suo shuo di nayang, ni neng shi tian yikuai yikuai luo zai women de tou shang; huo ni neng ba an la he tianshimen dou qing dao women mianqian lai;

huo ni you yi suo jinwu; huo ni neng shengtian, dan women jue bu xiangxin ni neng shengtian, chufei ni jiang gei women yi ben women neng du dong de jingdian.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zanmei wo de zhu chaojue! Wo zhishi yi wei shou zhu [an la] paiqian de fanren.”
